item.0.name: Toilet paper
item.1.name: Broken wine bottle
item.2.name: Copy
item.2.desc: A student's copy, lost by Flo
item.3.name: Chainsaw
item.4.name: Coffee
dlg.flo.title: Flo
dlg.flo.0:
Whoops! I can't find my architecture
copies! If I don't give them back
to my students in time, they are going
to kill me!
dlg.flo.2:
Oh, I know! I'll go ask Max, maybe
did he see them! If I recall correctly,
he recently moved to the Blue village.
dlg.flo.noinventoryspace:
There isn't enough space in your
inventory.
dlg.max.title: Max
dlg.max.b1:
Ah, damn! You have to look for them.
I'd happily give you a hand, but I
have my Aquaponey class to attend to.
dlg.max.b2:
You need to explore as many areas as you
can, I'm afraid that due to the wind,
your copies have flown to various parts
of the island.
dlg.max.b3:
I wouldn't be surprised if some ended up
in the Red village, or worse, in the
snowy areas. Maybe some of them aren't
far from here too.
dlg.max.b4:
With some luck, someone might have found
one and will give it back to you if you
ask nicely. Either way, good luck!
Feel free to come back if you get stuck.
dlg.max.c0: You've found all of them, congrats!
dlg.max.c3c:
The game is
finished,
isn't it?
dlg.max.c6: You're not supposed to see this text.
dlg.max.a0: Hey there! Have you found your copies?
dlg.max.a1: Do you want to hear my poem again?
dlg.max.o1.1:
I don't think you actually have found
them all yet...
dlg.max.o2.1:
Here's a riddle! If you succeed,
I'll help you.
dlg.max.rep2:
Congrats! Here is a poem I have
written in french to help you.
dlg.max.o3:
"Demain, dès l’aube,
à l’heure où blanchit la campagne,
Tu partiras. Vois-tu,
tu sais que je t’attends.
dlg.max.o4:
Tu iras par le désert,
tu iras par le village.
Je ne puis demeurer loin
de toi plus longtemps.
dlg.max.o5:
Tu marcheras les yeux fixés sur
tes pensées,
Sans rien voir au dehors,
sans entendre aucun son,
dlg.max.o6:
Seul, inconnu, le dos courbé,
les mains croisées,
Triste, et le jour pour toi sera comme
du Python.
dlg.max.o7:
Je ne regarderai ni l’or du soir qui
tombe,
Ni les voiles au loin descendant vers le
KFC,
dlg.max.o8:
Et quand j’arriverai, je mettrai sur
ta tombe
Un paquet de DS à corriger."
dlg.alex.title: Alex
dlg.alex.a0: Hello! Do you want some coffee?
dlg.alex.rep1: You'll find some in the chest!
dlg.tutorial.0:
You can move using the arrow keys
or WASD. You can also interact with
various elements using the ZXC keys
or the Enter key.
dlg.tutorial.1:
You can open your inventory using the
I key, and a menu is available
at the top right corner of the screen.
dlg.tutorial.2:
You can pause the game or close a menu
using the ESCAPE key.
dlg.tutorial.3:
You can also sprint by holding the
SHIFT key.
dlg.pnj3.title: Riri
dlg.pnj3.0: Hi. What can I do for you?
dlg.pnj3.1:
Your copies? Are they these
mysterious pieces of paper I've seen
everywhere? Here, I kept one.
dlg.pnj2.title: Fifi
dlg.pnj2.1:
I think I've seen one in a
chest at the Red village's square.
dlg.pnj1.title: Loulou
dlg.pnj1.1: Hi, may you please help me?
dlg.pnj1.2:
I'm looking for the Blue village, would
you happen to know in which direction
it is?
dlg.pnj1.4:
You lied! The Blue village was on the
South!
dlg.pnj1.5:
Thank you very much, I could find
my way thanks to you.
credits.line.1: Congratulations, you have managed to find all copies.
credits.line.2: Now the students will be able to receive their grades.
credits.line.3: Thank you for playing our game.
credits.line.7: A game by Tahar, Matthieu & Agathe
